stories.headline: UN Security Council Passes Resolution on Global Cyber Warfare Norms
stories.summary: The resolution establishes new international guidelines to prevent state-sponsored cyberattacks, aiming to reduce global digital conflicts and enhance stability.

stories.headline: Quantum Computing Startup Achieves New Milestone in Error Correction
stories.summary: A leading quantum firm announced a significant breakthrough in reducing quantum error rates, accelerating the path to practical quantum applications.

stories.headline: East African Nations Launch Joint Initiative to Combat Desert Locust Swarms
stories.summary: Several countries have united to deploy advanced pest control methods against resurgent locust swarms, protecting food security for millions.

stories.headline: Major Trade Bloc Finalizes Digital Services Tax Agreement
stories.summary: European Union nations reached a consensus on a harmonized digital services tax, impacting global tech giants and setting a precedent for other regions.

stories.headline: Deep-Sea Expedition Discovers New Ecosystem Thriving Near Volcanic Vents
stories.summary: Scientists found a unique ecosystem in the Pacific, revealing unknown biodiversity and offering insights into extremophile life on Earth.
